definition: to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
erhua variant of 省勁|省劲[sheng3 jin4]

sentences.english: Both science and ShengJin due to partition.
sentences.chinese: 預定的分區既科學又省勁。

sentences.english: The fewer oranges you get, the less you will have to carry.
sentences.chinese: 你得到的橘子越少，你拿起來就越省勁。
